CDC_Line_Coding_t Struct Reference

#include <DualCDC.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t BaudRateBPS
uint8_t CharFormat
uint8_t ParityType
uint8_t DataBits

Detailed Description

Type define for the virtual serial port line encoding settings, for storing the current USART configuration as set by the host via a class specific request.

Field Documentation

uint32_t CDC_Line_Coding_t::BaudRateBPS

Baud rate of the virtual serial port, in bits per second

uint8_t CDC_Line_Coding_t::CharFormat

Character format of the virtual serial port, a value from the CDCDevice_CDC_LineCodingFormats_t enum

uint8_t CDC_Line_Coding_t::DataBits

Bits of data per character of the virtual serial port

uint8_t CDC_Line_Coding_t::ParityType

Parity setting of the virtual serial port, a value from the CDCDevice_LineCodingParity_t enum
